tags: None
review:
Dr Ashwani Maichand !
A very nice and polite man with a smiling face.
He treats you well. I have done my spine disc l5 s1 surgery at CK birla hospital punjabi bagh delhi.
By the grace of God everything was fine. I would like to thank Ashwani Sir for his excellent work.
I don’t feel like i am operated 3 days before and all the credit goes to Ashwani Sir and his dedicated staff. 
May Allah bless You and your family sir.
Keep smiling keep shining
From. Bilal Hassan Wani 
Srinagar kashmir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctors Explanation is very good very friendly behaviour with the patient,,we are satisfied.i love to recomend other.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am Mukesh Devi from Roorkee Uttarakhand we got the information about the Dr Ashwani maichand on YouTube, He is a best doctor also a good person, treated patient very politely listen to the patient query and answer all the query of the patient. All the staff of hospital is very cooperative. Hospital is so neat and clean provide all the facilities to the patient. Today we  going  to a total hip replacement surgery hope all the things will go in right manner. We are confident about the surgery bcoz of Dr Ashwani maichand he is a brilliant Dr *** **** ***** **********

tags: Wait time,
review: When any patient pays a fee of ₹ 1700 in the name of appointment, he wants all his questions to be cleared and does not want that no one even sees his report.  Just look at one X-ray and tell them that you just do this, you will be fine, I had many documents from the latest ones like 2 MRI X-rays but the doctor did not even touch the MRI out of them, I had to undergo a test within 5 minutes.  He made it free inside, today even after coming back from there I have many questions, will I have to meet him again for that, will I have to pay a fee of ₹ 1700 again for this..?  But this is not right, very few people raise objection, t**** ** * ******* **** **** ******* ******* I came to Dr. Ashwani ji after watching the video… And one more thing, I was told that 1500 appointment charge.  Isn't it ₹ 1700, ₹ 200, I don't know what was taken for registration which was not told on the first call, I don't know but from many people if you charge any fee then complete details about it.  Give these future calls to your patients... But none of my confusion went away after meeting the doctor...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Good doctor 
Well maintained hospital by housekeeping staff  good food 
Positive atmosphere  good staff

review: “Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.”

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Iam Satisfied with Dr Aswin sir  he explain me very well about hip replacement and he guided me iam from hyderabad

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Docter Ashwani is an outstanding surgeon and I HIGHLY recommend him. He performed hip replacement surgery for my 71 yrs old father and tremendously motivated him to walk during recovery phase, due to which my father is walking very well on his legs now (feels like a new life). He is the best surgeon in India, very friendly and incredible experience . Grateful to him forever for giving this new life to my father.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor didn’t seem to be bothered with patients pain and troubles. He mentioned multiple times it’s a minor injury that will take 6 months to heal. I’m unable to even tie my shoe laces with my grade 3 muscle tear and doctor kept repeating that there is nothing medical science can do, let it heal itself. I highly doubt he understands what sports injuries are.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I am glad to meet Dr Ashwani sir,I apreciate ,my hip issue query and doubts cleared now ,and suggestion to me u take time to decide your hip replacement surgery
